alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 28 at 11:05AM EDT until July 31 at 10:43PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. Kentucky River at Heidelberg affecting Lee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...Until late Sunday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 20.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 28.9 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 28.6 feet on 05/10/2009. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued 6 PM EDT.
